inclusion.criterion: Residence in the study area and intention to stay in the area for the duration of the pregnancy and for delivery.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Aged at least 16 years (pregnant adolescents younger than 16 years will be considered only if they are accompanied by a responsible adult (in the Gambia) or married (considered an adult by marriage in Burkina Faso and Benin).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to provide biological samples as and when required during the study period (blood and placental biopsy).
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: A history of sensitivity to sulphonamides.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Already participating in another research study
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones. However, there is no mention of sensitivity to sulphonamides or participation in another research study.
